# Scope chain examples
test_mod.0001 = {
    type = character_event
    
    trigger = {
        liege = {
            primary_title = {
                holder = { 
                    is_adult = yes 
                }
            }
        }
    }
    
    immediate = {
        liege.primary_title.holder = { 
            save_scope_as = target 
        }
        scope:target = { 
            add_gold = 100 
        }
    }
}
